1.name: Titanic
1.description: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

2.name: Good Will Hunting
2.description: Will Hunting, a janitor at M.I.T., has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.

3.name: Men in Black
3.description: A police officer joins a secret organization that polices and monitors extraterrestrial interactions on Earth.

4.name: Air Force One
4.description: Communist Radicals hijack Air Force One with The U.S. President and his family on board. The Vice President negotiates from Washington D.C., while the President, a Veteran, fights to rescue the hostages on board.

5.name: The Fifth Element
5.description: In the colorful future, a cab driver unwittingly becomes the central figure in the search for a legendary cosmic weapon to keep Evil and Mr. Zorg at bay.

6.name: Starship Troopers
6.description: Humans in a fascist, militaristic future wage war with giant alien bugs.

7.name: Jackie Brown
7.description: A middle-aged woman finds herself in the middle of a huge conflict that will either make her a profit or cost her life.

8.name: Hercules
8.description: The son of Zeus and Hera is stripped of his immortality as an infant and must become a true hero in order to reclaim it.

9.name: Liar Liar
9.description: A fast-track lawyer can't lie for 24 hours due to his son's birthday wish after he disappoints his son for the last time.

10.name: Batman & Robin
10.description: Batman and Robin try to keep their relationship together even as they must stop Mr. Freeze and Poison Ivy from freezing Gotham City.

11.name: Con Air
11.description: Newly paroled ex-con and former U.S. Ranger Cameron Poe finds himself trapped in a prisoner transport plane when the passengers seize control.

12.name: La vita è bella
12.description: When an open-minded Jewish librarian and his son become victims of the Holocaust, he uses a perfect mixture of will, humor, and imagination to protect his son from the dangers around their camp.

13.name: Boogie Nights
13.description: The story of a young man's adventures in the California pornography industry of the late 1970s and early 1980s.

14.name: Austin Powers: International Man of Mystery
14.description: A 1960s secret agent is brought out of cryofreeze to oppose his greatest enemy in the 1990s, where his social attitudes are glaringly out of place.

15.name: Lolita
15.description: A man marries his landlady so he can take advantage of her daughter.

16.name: The Devil's Advocate
16.description: An exceptionally adept Florida lawyer is offered a job at a high-end New York City law firm with a high-end boss - the biggest opportunity of his career to date.

17.name: Shin seiki Evangelion Gekijô-ban: Air/Magokoro wo, kimi ni
17.description: Concurrent theatrical ending of the TV series Shin Seiki Evangerion (1995).

18.name: As Good as It Gets
18.description: A single mother and waitress, a misanthropic author, and a gay artist form an unlikely friendship after the artist is assaulted in a robbery.

19.name: Gattaca
19.description: A genetically inferior man assumes the identity of a superior one in order to pursue his lifelong dream of space travel.

20.name: Grosse Pointe Blank
20.description: Martin Blank is a professional assassin. He is sent on a mission to a small Detroit suburb, Grosse Pointe, and, by coincidence, his ten-year high school reunion party is taking place there at the same time.

21.name: The Lost World: Jurassic Park
21.description: A research team is sent to the Jurassic Park Site B island to study the dinosaurs there, while an InGen team approaches with another agenda.

22.name: L.A. Confidential
22.description: As corruption grows in 1950s Los Angeles, three policemen -- one strait-laced, one brutal, and one sleazy -- investigate a series of murders with their own brand of justice.

23.name: Lost Highway
23.description: After a bizarre encounter at a party, a jazz saxophonist is framed for the murder of his wife and sent to prison, where he inexplicably morphs into a young mechanic and begins leading a new life.

24.name: Contact
24.description: Dr. Ellie Arroway (Jodie Foster), after years of searching, finds conclusive radio proof of extraterrestrial intelligence, sending plans for a mysterious machine.

25.name: Mononoke-hime
25.description: On a journey to find the cure for a Tatarigami's curse, Ashitaka finds himself in the middle of a war between the forest gods and Tatara, a mining colony. In this quest he also meets San, the Mononoke Hime.

26.name: Alien: Resurrection
26.description: 200 years after her death, Ellen Ripley is revived as a powerful human/alien hybrid clone. Along with a crew of space pirates, she must again battle the deadly aliens and stop them from reaching Earth.

27.name: Face/Off
27.description: In order to foil a terrorist plot, an FBI agent undergoes a facial transplant surgery and assumes the identity and physical appearance of a terrorist, but the plan turns from bad to worse when the same terrorist impersonates the FBI agent.

28.name: I Know What You Did Last Summer
28.description: Four young friends bound by a tragic accident are reunited when they find themselves being stalked by a hook-wielding maniac in their small seaside town.

29.name: The Game
29.description: After a wealthy banker is given an opportunity to participate in a mysterious game, his life is turned upside down when he becomes unable to distinguish between the game and reality.

30.name: Gummo
30.description: Lonely residents of a tornado-stricken Ohio town wander the deserted landscape trying to fulfill their boring, nihilistic lives.

31.name: The Jackal
31.description: An imprisoned I.R.A. fighter is freed to help stop a brutal, seemingly "faceless" assassin from completing his next job.

32.name: Volcano
32.description: A volcano erupts in downtown Los Angeles, threatening to destroy the city.

33.name: Donnie Brasco
33.description: An FBI undercover agent infiltrates the mob and finds himself identifying more with the mafia life, at the expense of his regular one.

34.name: Event Horizon
34.description: A rescue crew investigates a spaceship that disappeared into a black hole and has now returned...with someone or something new on-board.

35.name: Scream 2
35.description: Two years after the first series of murders, as Sydney acclimates to college life, someone donning the Ghostface costume begins a new string of killings.

36.name: Cube
36.description: 6 complete strangers of widely varying personality characteristics are involuntarily placed in an endless maze containing deadly traps.

37.name: My Best Friend's Wedding
37.description: When a woman's long-time friend reveals he's engaged, she realizes she loves him herself and sets out to get him, with only days before the wedding.

38.name: Spawn
38.description: An elite mercenary is killed, but comes back from Hell as a reluctant soldier of the Devil.

39.name: Anastasia
39.description: The last surviving child of the Russian Royal Family joins two con men to reunite with her grandmother, the Dowager Empress, while the undead Rasputin seeks her death.

40.name: Anaconda
40.description: A "National Geographic" film crew is taken hostage by an insane hunter, who forces them along on his quest to capture the world's largest - and deadliest - snake.

41.name: Tomorrow Never Dies
41.description: James Bond heads to stop a media mogul's plan to induce war between China and the UK in order to obtain exclusive global media coverage.

42.name: George of the Jungle
42.description: A man raised in the jungle by apes falls in love with a wealthy American heiress.

43.name: Dante's Peak
43.description: A vulcanologist arrives at a countryside town recently named the second most desirable place to live in America, and discovers that the long dormant volcano, Dante's Peak, may wake up at any moment.

44.name: The Full Monty
44.description: Six unemployed steel workers form a male striptease act. The women cheer them on to go for "the full monty" - total nudity.

45.name: Private Parts
45.description: The autobiographical story of Howard Stern, the radio rebel who is now also a TV personality, an author and a movie star.

46.name: The Devil's Own
46.description: A police officer uncovers the real identity of his house-guest, an I.R.A. terrorist in hiding.

47.name: Pâfekuto burû
47.description: A retired pop singer turned actress' sense of reality is shaken when she is stalked by an obsessed fan and seemingly a ghost of her past.

48.name: Funny Games
48.description: Two violent young men take a mother, father, and son hostage in their vacation cabin and force them to play sadistic "games" with one another for their own amusement.

49.name: The Rainmaker
49.description: An underdog lawyer takes on a fraudulent insurance company.

50.name: The Postman
50.description: A nameless drifter dons a postman's uniform and bag of mail as he begins a quest to inspire hope to the survivors living in post-apocalyptic America.
